scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist/ && mkdir ./dist/ && cp -R ./src/* ./dist/ && babel ./dist/index.js --presets minify --out-file ./dist/index.js && babel ./dist/service-worker.js --presets minify --out-file ./dist/service-worker.js && inliner --noimages --skip-absolute-urls ./dist/index.html > ./dist/index.dist.html && rm -rf ./dist/index.html && mv ./dist/index.dist.html ./dist/index.html && rm -rf ./dist/*.css && rm -rf ./dist/index.js
